title: Koishite Baby
description: Omega Kiyo is a pole dancer working in a club dedicated to Alpha customers. Kiyo's dream is to be his childhood friend Chii-chan's bride. But Chii-chan thinks of Kiyo as his little brother?? Kiyo, a tall and built Omega with a complex and Chii-chan, a firm and reliable, shorter Alpha, need to find their happy ending!
